summary: Finished reading my 1st book of 2025.  Some of my favorite quotes from Two Twisted Crowns by Rachel Gillig
title: Two Twisted Crowns by Rachel Gillig

summary:
I’m not what you’d call a prolific reader, but I do like to read books and the occasional manga now and then.  Here are the highlights (and lowlights) of my reading in 2024. 
 
Bird by Bird by Ann Lamott seems to have gotten a lot of attention because of Ted Lasso so I thought I’d give it a whirl...
title: 2024: The Year in Books

summary: RESURRECTION BAY Author: Emma Viskic Publisher: Pushkin Press ISBN: 9781782273622 Genre: Murder-Mystery Back Cover Blurb Caleb Zelic can’t hear you.  But he sees everything.  CALEB ZELIC IS ON THE HUNT FOR HIS FRIEND’S KILLER His childhood friend has been brutally murdered—fingers broken, throat slit—at his home in Melbourne...
title: Resurrection Bay by Emma Viskic

summary: I made my first squid post nineteen years ago this week.  Between then and now, I posted something about squid every week (with maybe only a few exceptions).  There is a lot out there about squid, even more if you count the other meanings of the word...
title: Friday Squid Blogging: Anniversary Post

summary: CAPTAIN MOXLEY AND THE EMBERS OF THE EMPIRE Author: Dan Hanks Publisher: Angry Robot ISBN: 9780857668721 Genre: Fantasy Back Cover Blurb In post-war 1952, the good guys are supposed to have won.  But not everything is as it seems when ex-Spitfire pilot Captain Samantha Moxley is dragged into a fight against the shadowy US government agency she used to work for.  Now, with former Nazis and otherworldly monsters on her trail, Captain Moxley is forced into protecting her archaeologist sister in a race to retrieve two ancient keys that will unlock the secrets of a long-lost empire—to ensure a civilisation-destroying weapon doesn’t fall into the wrong hands...
title: Captain Moxley and the Embers of Empire by Dan Hanks

summary: I had 18 years of my Reddit posts analyzed for neurosis, hostility and aggression only to find out that I am actually rather nice and helpful.  My computer likes me
title: My Computer Had Nice Things to Say About Me Today

summary: IN SHADOWS WE FALL Author: Devin Madson Publisher: Cloudburst Books ISBN: 9780995413344 Genre: Fantasy Back Cover Blurb Empress Li is out of favour at court.  Foreign-born and past her prime, she is to be set aside.  But she won’t go quietly...
title: In Shadows We Fall by Devin Madson

summary: THE LAST SMILE IN SUNDER CITY Author: Luke Arnold Publisher: Orbit ISBN: 9780316455824 Genre: Fantasy Back Cover Blurb Welcome to Sunder City.  The magic is gone but the monsters remain.  I’m Fetch Phillips, just like it says on the window...
title: The Last Smile in Sunder City by Luke Arnold

summary: THE WINDSOR KNOT Author: S J Bennett Publisher: William Morrow ISBN: 9780063072534 Genre: Murder-Mystery Back Cover Blurb It is the early spring of 2016 and Queen Elizabeth is at Windsor Castle in advance of her 90th birthday celebrations.  But the preparations are interrupted when a guest is found dead in one of the Castle bedrooms.  The scene suggests the young Russian pianist strangled himself, but a badly tied knot leads MI5 to suspect foul play was involved...
title: The Windsor Knot by SJ Bennett
